lender.name: Sherry
lender.loan_because: I want people to know the freedom of having thier own bussiness. I want them to know people are behind them supporting them. I would give these people the money, but I guess tho concept is to give true independence and make my money avl to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nuse in a mid-sized hospital. Mostly what I do is help prepare Patients for surgery, I do patient teaching, more than actual care.

lender.name: Clint
lender.loan_because: Its the best way to help people make their lives and their communities better.
lender.occupational_info: I try to help people in my job everyday and on Kiva too!

lender.name: Rebekah
lender.loan_because: I love the stories and the hope that they invoke.

lender.name: Edie
lender.loan_because: I like the philosophy of helping people help themselves. Kiva brings the world and its needs to a personal level.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: Kiva allows me to have an immediate direct impact on someone else's life. No bureacracy, no red tape. Just me and the entrepreneuer. It's nice to know you can reach out and help someone with just a few keystrokes and a click of the mouse.
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in helping people understand finance.

lender.name: Devin
lender.occupational_info: I rock out.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to get back where they are supose to be, and if i can help them then i will.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I am honoring the memory of my daughter, Lily Grace. Money is loaned from Lily's memorial fund. I want to make a difference in the lives of families that are working hard to build a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the legal profession. I work for a non-profit organization and I do pro-bono work for immigrant women who have been abused. I am also a mother to one year old daughter, Sophia.

lender.name: Maryanna
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the concept of sharing with others for greater good of us all. It is especially gratifying to assist those who have an entrepreneurial spirit! When we work together with passion, we can accomplish anything!
lender.occupational_info: I am a small business owner, offering health services to others... and I also do writing and consulting.

lender.name: Jodi, Lynn and Olivia
lender.loan_because: we care

lender.name: Nicola
lender.loan_because: I believe that microloans to motivated individuals are the best form of aid.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Learning to borrow is infinitely better than learning to take a handout.

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: The unequal distribution of wealth and the unavailability of equal opportunity is evidence of our spiritual poverty and unjust social organization. I loan because it is a question of both my personal integrity and the collective integrity of humanity as a species. For me, Kiva is part of a new global message of abundance and self-giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of psychology, science, yoga and spirituality.

lender.name: randy
lender.loan_because: We are unusually fortunate in North America, and I have seen the satisfaction of giving in a dear friend, a benefactor and philanthropist, who recently died.
lender.occupational_info: doctor

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: this is a wonderful way to help those who want to better their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Les
lender.loan_because: I am very lucky to have all that I have. I believe it is essential that everyone on this planet have the means to lead a satisfying and productive life. This is a great way to move the world in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the software of for the computer systems that support the Medicaid health care programs in the United States.

lender.name: Christian
lender.loan_because: It's important to recognize others need help no matter how small. I have the ability and heart to do so, I do.
lender.occupational_info: Primarily media related.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place for all children.
lender.occupational_info: I help children with learning and emotional difficulties in schools.

lender.name: patricia
lender.occupational_info: creative, original, ecclectic

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, and so little goes such a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I used to help people with emotional and mental difficulties.

lender.name: richard & kris
lender.loan_because: It will help alleviate poverty in the world. Micah 6:8 "Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with your God"

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because: I believe Kiva has come up with a very direct way for individuals to help individuals. It is innovative and admirable and has been proven successful.
lender.occupational_info: While retired I publish a small seniors paper for people in Thunder Bay Canada.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I know small gestures can mean great things to those in need
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to speakers of other languages

lender.name: Jerri
lender.loan_because: I believe we can empower the world. A business, a job, the pride that comes from providing for your family - I can give all that for so little.
lender.occupational_info: My employees and I help businesses to install and use business software.

lender.name: Omarr
lender.loan_because: I want to help others by giving them opportunities to better themselves while establishing friendships along the way.

lender.name: Heath
lender.loan_because: I like the concept; and I can imagine how hard it is or would be to get a traditional loan for these people.
lender.occupational_info: I sell tickets for sold out events.

lender.name: Charmaine
lender.loan_because:
Something that seems small to some of us, can make a huge difference in others life. Don't underestimate a small gift!
"There are generations yet unborn whose very lives will be shifted and shaped by the moves you make and the actions you take today. And tomorrow. And the next day. And the next." Andy Andrews-The Butterfly Effect
lender.occupational_info: helicopter pilot, stay at home mom and busy girls

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: I feel that i could change peoples lives
lender.occupational_info: I go to an all girl school in New york and I work at a local drug store on register.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I feel so fortunate to have what I have and would like to share a little with those that are less fortunate. As the old saying goes"Give them a fish and they will eat for a day, teach them to fish and they will eat for a lifetime" It is great to see all these people really wanting to work for a living.

lender.name: Jeannine and Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: What an honor to be able to help in some small way. We we've reloaned our initial loan several times over now. What a way to pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff works in the IT field and Jeannine is a fishery biologist.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves an opportunity to better themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I train public school teachers and teach English to speakers of other languages.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: It's a privilege to participate with these hardworking and creative entrepreneurs from around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work in telecommunications and so I understand the importance of computer and communications technology to businesses.

lender.name: benjamin
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: We live in the world we make, and this programme will help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help my company talk to our consumers - by telling people about our products and listening to them, making sure we provide the products they are after.

lender.name: Emily
lender.occupational_info: Grad Student @ UC-Irvine

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Lots of people doing small things can make a big difference and micro-finance is an ideal way for everyone to get together and help someone break out of the cycle of poverty
lender.occupational_info: T-shirt designer

lender.name: Digby
lender.loan_because: I like helping people!
lender.occupational_info: I'm in 7th grade.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the world in a really positive way, and the knowledge that what little I do is empowering someone else's life in a bigger way, is both humbling and deeply rewarding. Micro-loans is a brilliant concept, and I so wish many more people would get on board.
lender.occupational_info: I live in Sydney, Australia. I prefer to write on social justice issues, but I also enjoy writing on other subjects. The power of the written word can never be under-estimated.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I appreciate supporting people that are working hard to launch/grow new and meaningful enterprises in their communities!
lender.occupational_info: I help companies in the consumer and entertainment realms promote their brand and tell their stories to the media and other audiences.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help.
lender.occupational_info: Student studying Economics and International Development

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place by offering oportunities to people around the world. I also want to learn about what it takes to run a business from the feed back I get from the entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I go to school at East Lansing High. I'm in 10th grade and am involved in school sports. I get good grades and am interested in loaning out money to learn about businesses.

lender.name: Keya
lender.loan_because: I returned home early from the Peace Corps due to illness. This is a way that I can continue to help.
lender.occupational_info: I assist the seniors in our community to obtain food, health care and in-home assistance so that they remain independent, healthy and safe.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.occupational_info: High School Teacher- Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, USA

lender.name: Garrett
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and hope to be able to be a blessing to others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran Pastor in the Evangelical Lutheran Church in America

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: Money makes the work go round and I support entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: I want you to have an opportunity to try at something you might not otherwise get.
lender.occupational_info: I assist customers with financial matters. This participation (loan with Kiva) was a gift that I am passing on.

lender.name: Danna
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Robynn
lender.loan_because: It is an uplifting and inspiring process. People helping people all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: Health care professional, who cares for women through pregnancy and help them bring their babies into the world.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Though I have little by my own country's standard, I have so much more than those in the third world. I can give a bit to give them so much.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: It's so easy how could I not?
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently researching tropical diseases in Ecuador to come up with better control strategies.

lender.name: Deborah
lender.occupational_info: artist who specializes in graphic design for small non-profit organizations

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I am privileged to be able to help people who are helping themselves
lender.occupational_info: Managing the testing of software and computer systems

lender.name: The DeHarts
lender.loan_because: We want to share the blessings God has given us, and we are amazed by the potential of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: Medical care and medical software development for developing countries.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I make big companies work better.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: People need help and it feels great to help them!
lender.occupational_info: I provide companies online learning programs to help their employees do their job better.

lender.name: Camille
lender.loan_because: I want to help people better support their families.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I have so much-a spacious apartment, a healthy husband, a good education-and not everyone can afford that. I want to give back, to help other people make their dreams a reality like mine have become. I believe this world has room for all of us to give, and room for all of us to get better. And if I can help someone have a better life, that means more to me than having less in my wallet.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, studying the law.

lender.name: David & Janie
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. It is a small way of helping. It is the right kind of help.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with little or no money to get and hold a job; my wife teaches history to 13 year olds

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people in need help themselves and improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I interpret X-rays, CT scans, Nuclear Medicine scans, and Mammograms.

lender.name: Alan & Sally
lender.loan_because: We believe everyone deserves an opportunity. Kiva provides us with an opportunity to help.

lender.name: The Wollman Family
lender.loan_because: We want to be able to help somebody.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to earn a good living for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help executives operate from their wisdom more of the time. Thus, they accelerate meeting their goals.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: it is a practical way to help people and hear their stories. It gives the recipient dignity and power over their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: I run an organisation that provides services to people with disabilities.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I think the best thing you can do for people who want to improve their lives is to help them realize their own potential, to give them the tools and that extra push needed to create their own success. That is the key to true sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies and projects find the financing they need to realize their goals.

lender.name: Alberta
lender.loan_because: this gift to help others was given to me

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of getting money directly to an individual rather than to an institution.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I'd like to... I know it will help others.... and because i want to!!

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: I love to pay it forward and help make a difference in some else's life!
lender.occupational_info: I help people who are recovering from mental illness on their path to recovery to live in the most appropriate and least restrictive environment

lender.name: AMG Trust
lender.loan_because: With these contributions, I am hopeful i can help the aspirations of the others.
lender.occupational_info: computers

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: I believe that women all over the world deserve the opportunity to be successful.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I love to be connected to people across the world. I've been so fortunate in life; I want to share what I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist and designer for animated television shows.

lender.name: Matthew & Stephanie
lender.loan_because: We are very lucky people and we feel it is right that we do what we can to help others.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: it is the most empowering way to help
lender.occupational_info: I work at a school for children with behavioral challenges.

lender.name: The Rossiters
lender.loan_because: it is a great way to make a direct positive impact in somebody's life
lender.occupational_info: We are a family of 4. Peter is an Engneer, Rachel sells Real Estate and we have 2 Daughters - Georgia 9 and Sydney 3.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think its a good way to help those in need without creating unhealthy dependancies.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the construction of new commercial buildings.

lender.name: Tonia
lender.loan_because: It's great to be able to make such a big difference in someone's life with such a small gesture.

lender.name: raymond
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to help other people directly. Instead of donating money, you can help other people when it is repaid. And if they default well then it is automatically a donation :-)
lender.occupational_info: I help other companies with their computer database programs

lender.name: Allison
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone a chance to be something more.
lender.occupational_info: I have the awesome responsibility of raising two children. I am incredibly lucky.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people less fortunate than myself to help themselves through their own work.
lender.occupational_info: I used to publish books about plants, horticulture, botany, gardening. I sold my business in 2006 and now I paint and do volunteer work with various nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: jeffrey
lender.loan_because: i believe in you.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with problems.

lender.name: Molesworth
lender.loan_because: Middle class guilt.
lender.occupational_info: Advanced, forthright, significant.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: I want to help individuals better their lives through their own strengths and skills so that they can sustain the improvements for the long-term.
lender.occupational_info: I work in admissions and recruitment at a small university.

lender.name: Tarun
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people with medical problems.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: Surely we can change something

lender.name: Peggy
lender.occupational_info: helping to distribute temporary, emergency assistance to those in need and fund raising

lender.name: Bhim
lender.loan_because: I loan because it feels really good inside to know I can make a small but important difference in someone,s life.
lender.occupational_info: Just trying to make a difference

lender.name: Courtney
lender.loan_because: its a small world.

lender.name: Jicku & Naomi
lender.loan_because: Through KIVA I can help entrepreneurs create opportunity for themselves, their families and their communities.

lender.name: Michael and Margo
lender.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to make a difference in the life of a hard working indvidual

lender.name: tim
lender.loan_because: Pottery Barn Rule and a New Year's resolution to give 1/mo.
lender.occupational_info: As Captain America saving the world! ..........or basically, what I can do to clean up the mess the US leaves behind.

lender.name: wendy
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate to live in US. By US standards I am not rich but in a world view I am. I feel an obligation to share with those with less resources and opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I administer first aid to people in an emergency room environment in a hospital.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: this was a Christmas gift from my uncle.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in the United States.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: we, my wife and I, are artists and artisans

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I am so grateful for what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I develop software to analyze the language of legally significant documents such as business memos, suicide notes, threat letters, etc.

lender.name: Conway
lender.loan_because: I have a wish to support those who have the courage and commitment to improve their wellbeing through hard work
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturing engineer who has worked in several different countries. Delivery skipper sailing yachts to and from different parts of the world

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: To support women entrepreneurs who have not had the advantages I did when I started my business.
lender.occupational_info: Capital Virtual Assistance provides administrative support to entrepreneurs virtually, from my office to theirs.

lender.name: Damien
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I write databases and migrate data between databases.

lender.name: M.G.
lender.loan_because: I believe in women's self-determination.
lender.occupational_info: I write stories, poems, essays, and articles about Philippine traditions and nature.

lender.name: Prisma Light
lender.loan_because: We have seen firsthand that people will literally pull themselves up by their bootstraps if they are given a break.
lender.occupational_info: We are a media production company; we make videos, Flash presentations, TV, radio and docs for companies, not-for-profits, and government agencies world-wide.

lender.name: Gary
lender.loan_because: I feel fortunate to have found this fun, easy way to be involved, everyone deserves the chance to support their family and improve their life. It's also great to see people making the best of what life has given them.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I've been touched by His noodly appendage.
lender.occupational_info: Preparing young people to survive in a somewhat scary world and to do so with an attitude of caring and sharing.

lender.name: Ruhlin Girls
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: We're students

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I believe that socially responsible, publicly accountable capitalism works better than any other economic system, that no one rises to any position in any society without the help of others, and that helping others is simply a morally good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I learn and teach what i've learned so that others don't have to make the same mistakes.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I can't think of anything more rewarding than helping people who are trying to help themselves and their families!
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office of social workers who also help children and families.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: To help others help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Energy Management Engineer

lender.name: Reg
lender.loan_because: I like to see people continuously better there situation with dignity
lender.occupational_info: Raise Capital for business purposes.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to change their lives.

lender.name: Teddy
lender.loan_because: I want to help people improve the quality of their lives
lender.occupational_info: I am an investor who typically lends money to small comapnies.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: These people aren't giving up, they just need a little light. I help those who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Im involved in investment related work.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I feel this type of program supports and enables people to work to support themselves and their family with dignity and pride; the effects are both positive and far reaching andca be passed on from generation to generation.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an artist in theater. I'm a playwright--I create the story to be told; I'm a director--I facilitate the story that is told; and I'm a professional actor, I interpret and tell the story to be seen, heard and experienced.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can directly help give a leg-up to others to have a better chance at a real future for themselves & their families.
lender.occupational_info: Stock trader & bookseller. Work for myself & I live a very good life in the best country in the world - Australia

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I had some helping hands along the way. This is a great opportunity for me to offer a helping hand to others.

lender.name: Emily & Brian
lender.loan_because: My wonderful boyfriend gave me a Kiva gift certificate!
lender.occupational_info: I help people so they can one day fully support themselves.

lender.name: Ewen
lender.loan_because: I see this as an excellent way of getting money directly to people so they can help themselves...........
lender.occupational_info: Student of the world financial markets.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: of the very practical way of providing opportunities for people to make a go in life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired from work as an industrial chemist specializing in plastics in telecommunications. Now happily retired and more able to spend time and energy in things that matter in a different way.

lender.name: Olivier
lender.loan_because: that's the best kind of aid

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: You can't make things better with slogans or rhetoric. People who can make a difference need to put rubber on the road!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a financial analyst in a commercial bank, specifically with regards to interest rate and FX derivatives.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepeneur running my own business and I understand the struggles and rewards of running a small business. I want to see other people succeed in their endeavors.
lender.occupational_info: I sell insurance through the workplace market.

lender.name: Thierry
lender.loan_because: Just because!
lender.occupational_info: College Professor

lender.name: Harrison/Wells family
lender.loan_because: Our family is involved with Kiva because we know that we have always been blessed and would like to return the favor.
lender.occupational_info: Our family is comprised of current and retired educators, business people, government employees, non-profit administrators and students.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: Business Owner - Rubber Art Stamp Company
lender.loan_because: It is an amazing feeling to be help others in need. And to be able to add a small percentage of a large loan that will help in a BIG way is very exciting!

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva enables me to do so!

lender.name: anonymous
lender.loan_because: It's one of the simplest things you can do to make a huge difference in another human being's life.

lender.name: Lowes Family
lender.loan_because: I've been very fortunate..and believe, if we can, we need to share with those less fortunate...hopefully my kids learn from that. As they say...we can all save a little, spend a little and give a little.
lender.occupational_info: I sell sponsorships for a professional sports team.

lender.name: pooka33
lender.loan_because: We are all One.
lender.occupational_info: Heartist.

lender.name: Renato & Carla
lender.loan_because: Most people are honest and want a chance to succeed in life. A small loan might make a difference in order for someone to get that chance.

lender.name: Nadie and Micki
lender.loan_because: It is a joy to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I wrote advertising for newspapers and magazines and websites.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I think this will work. (Big thanks to KIVA visionaries who are enabling thousands of individuals to prove the big banks and the IMF wrong. The poor are at least as trustworthy as the rich.)
lender.occupational_info: Union leader, promoting and protecting the rights of education workers.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I think microfinance is a wonderful way to help people
lender.occupational_info: I offer support to sick people in hospitals.

lender.name: Robert + Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: We loan to help. Fantastic way to help out in our own little way.
lender.occupational_info: Service industry

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: Its a bit more interesting that just a simple donation. I feel this helps people help themselves. Its a great idea and well done
lender.occupational_info: Construction Management

lender.name: Rachel
lender.occupational_info: I design and paint scenery for the theatre. I work collaboratively with other artists to develop and execute plays and operas.

lender.name: Aaron
lender.loan_because: I believe it is our responsibility to help those who need help. It's that simple!
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers and students.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I know these loans make a difference between succes and hardship.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan thier financial future and realize thier goals.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it's one small way that I can give back.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Because it makes my heart happy. Because I can do so much with so little. Because I can affect someone's life besides my own.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: To help people who wish to become more self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company based in California, US. I help our employees use software applications.

lender.name: Becky
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.name: Dave and LeeAnne
lender.loan_because: There is too much inequity in wealth and resources on our planet
lender.occupational_info: I work with youth and adults who have drug and alcohol problems. My wife (recently deceased) is an artist.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because:
I may never see tomorrow, There's no written guarantee, and the things that happened yesterday belong to history.
I cannot predict the future, I cannot change the past. I must use this moment wisely for it soon will pass away, and be lost to me forever as part of yesterday.
I must exercise compassion, help the fallen to their feet. Be a friend unto the friendless, make an empty life complete.
The unkind things I do today may never be undone, and the friendships that I fail to win may nevermore be won.
I may not have another chance to pray, and thank God with humble heart for giving me this day.
lender.occupational_info: I construct and repair wooden cabinets, furniture, fixtures and related products. I work in a noisy and dusty environment and carry out limited verbal communication, turning off saws and other tools before entering into in-depth communication.

lender.name: Trish
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: dispatch for 12 different cities, it's a challenge but rewarding

lender.name: Copywriter
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I make money by helping people make money

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: This seems like a pro-active way to make a small difference and show that people, not governments, are the roots for success.
lender.occupational_info: I teach adult students to use, manage, and design computer systems.

lender.name: Simon & Family
lender.loan_because: We feel like we're helping to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I write science fiction novels and computer software and the rest of the family are very arty.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky to have been born in a country where education and opportunities are plentiful. I'm hopeful that these small loans will ease the lives of entrepreneurs who've been a little less fortunate in life's lottery and help them to realize their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently (Feb 2012) getting a technology start-up off the ground in the transport sector.

lender.name: Kelvin
lender.loan_because: I wish to try and help those less fortunate than I am. We have only one chance in this life - this is one way I can try and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I run consults on IT security matters, especially in network security. I also run the occasional audit.

lender.name: tod
lender.loan_because: my God wants me to do everything i can to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help create and and produce fashion shows- a group of designers who are showing their latest clothing designs to the public come to me to help them get models, photogtaphers and media attention.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to help other people.

lender.name: Liam, Kim & Ronan
lender.loan_because: What goes around comes around. I have been through the development stages of my business and received great support from friends and colleagues. I want to return those favours by helping others and show my son how important it is to think of others
lender.occupational_info: I advise small business owners and professionals on how to manage, protect and build their wealth funds to provide for retirement and other objectives.

lender.name: Keltia Design, Inc.
lender.loan_because: We are a small business and we know how a loan can help get a business get off the ground. We would like to help out other small businesses in poor countries.
lender.occupational_info: Keltia Design, Inc. specializes in supplying manpower, training and engineering design services to the aerospace industry in the US.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I find this spirit of global outreach unique and exciting!
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand medicine and its impact on thier overall health

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: Looking at my life, I'm pretty privileged; house, car, couple of motorbikes, etc. at 24 isn't a bad start. Strong work and entrepreneurial skills set my life in a positive direction. I hope to help others achieve the same.
lender.occupational_info: Work for one of the largest IT outsourcers in the world. Interesting and often difficult work, but I love the challenges.

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: Every person is born equal - it is just the circumstances into which they are born that are not equal. My circumstances are better than those who have had the courage to ask for help through Kiva so I want to give them the help they deserve.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to live and work independently after they have experienced injuries or ilnesses that have limited their capacity.

lender.name: Martyn & Margaret
lender.loan_because: We want to and we can.

lender.name: Grahame
lender.loan_because: I'm excited seeing people take opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a small carpet cleaning company as well as a small software development company

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: Piggy bank at maximum capacity. Left with no alternative.
lender.occupational_info: I teach the amazing science of ENGLISH(!) to high school students.

lender.name: Martine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that are trying to build a better life for themselves and their families. This, for me, is just about the only kind of aid that makes sense.

lender.name: Blake
lender.loan_because: my brother gave me a gift certificate and it looked like a lot of fun. Now it's addictive.
lender.occupational_info: I repair, restore and/or rebind antiquarian books.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky to live in the country I do

lender.name: Seven James
lender.loan_because: I have a good start in life from being given a chance and want to help others have a chance
lender.occupational_info: I have an investment company that my Dad runs until I can. We invest in property and shares and business.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world
lender.occupational_info: Student doing GCSE's

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: A leg-up is much better than a handout.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: I have travelled and wonder why am I so fortunate to have opportunity and the power to choose.
lender.occupational_info: Helping young teenagers reach for the stars

lender.name: Madir
lender.loan_because: Large scale change comes from the accumulated impact of many small items.
lender.occupational_info: Building web applications to track customer satisfaction.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: One day I might need a loan too

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: "Buried within individual awareness is the desire to maintain the dignity and the integrity of humankind"

lender.name: christine
lender.loan_because: i got this in a cristams present, and i want to help others in need, so that people can take care of themselves
lender.occupational_info: iam a student who studies equnomics..

lender.name: Katrin
lender.loan_because: I am trying to make a positive contribution.

lender.name: Venessa Paech
lender.loan_because: it's a joy to support amazing people with vision and passion (I also believe it's my obligation as someone who has more than I need)
lender.occupational_info: I connect people with shared passions from all over the world and help create meaningful conversations.

lender.name: Jose A Reyero
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Larissa
lender.loan_because: it is a way to help and make a small difference.

lender.name: Toby
lender.loan_because: What a great way to help a few deserving people who aren't asking for handouts....simply a little help from their fellow man.
lender.occupational_info: My work consists of buying and improving properties before re-selling or leasing them. I work in both Florida and North Carolina. In addition, I have real estate licenses in three states, and sell residential real estate.

lender.name: hawq
lender.loan_because: it can make a tiny bit of difference

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good....why else?
lender.occupational_info: A "Jack of All Trades", I do whatever needs to get done.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving back in as many ways as possible, especially helping women become self-sustaining and self supporting.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a business and intellectual property attorney, with a focus on trademark, copyright, publishing, and social media law.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I listen for possibility
lender.occupational_info: It is about giving back.

lender.name: Turhan
lender.loan_because: I have never seen anything as compelling to change a live as a microloan.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist - I combine psychology and biology to discover what makes each of us a unique person.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that these loans have a direct positive impact on the recipient's ability to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their community.
lender.occupational_info: I develop new business opportunities in the field of Supply Chain Efficiency for global corporations

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to send a little love around the world.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have many blessings and would like to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Manage my home and lead a Bible Study.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I fully understand how fortunate I am to have been born in the United States, the land of opportunity. I run a small business and know first hand how difficult it can be to acquire money for start-up costs and to keep up with recurring business expenses while trying to turn a profit. I respect kiva.org for being such an innovative, forward thinking organization in aiding those who are hard workers but simply need a boost now and then.
lender.occupational_info: I have a fulfilling, full-time job within the mr/dd field, I am also a full-time college student and I run a small online artisan jewelry site, Juicy Glass Jewels.

lender.name: ivan
lender.loan_because: The world needs it
lender.occupational_info: Philospher

lender.name: Alice
lender.loan_because: What a great way to encourage and give people hope for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am married 46 years.. homemaker and still remain active in my 14 grandchildren's lives.

lender.name: Al & Jana
lender.loan_because: We want to send the message, "Pay It Forward." So little money goes a long way for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: We both work in a call center for an insurance company. We assist customers with their questions regarding their insurance policy.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I like to see people succeed and do well in life. A lot of people don't receive the same opportunities as we do and I would like to pay it foward.
lender.occupational_info: I research and develop protein therapies.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: my mother taught me about the great transforming power of love.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse who works with patients who have emotional problems or who have had a great stress or trauma in their life that they are trying to come to terms with.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Becuase I love the idea that such small amounts of money can truly make a difference... the sucess stories are wonderful.
lender.occupational_info: Manage vacation rental homes. People go on vacation and rent private homes instead of staying in hotel.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about helping people, and I am an aspiring business owner.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international retailer.

lender.name: Father & Son
lender.loan_because: It's better to give than receive!!!

lender.name: Akins
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. There is nothing better than empowering people to be self sufficient. Everybody has had a helping hand at one time or the other in there lifetime to help them reach and archive their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I Facilitate management training classes

lender.name: Jerry McCrae
lender.loan_because: I started my VO business with less than $1000.00 and I want to help others with their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I use my voice to record announcements for radio and television. BigMouthStudio.com is the perfect studio for anyone who needs an extravoice for promtional or commercial spots. We do image liners too.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur, have had my own business. I believe in sponsoring/teaching
lender.occupational_info: Currently an area/territory sales manager dealing in high tech product sales

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I truly respect the "working" poor of this world. I hope I never have to test my own courage given the same set of circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the electrical portion of Construction projects. ie. Airports, Prisons, Sewage Treatment Plants, Retail etc.

lender.name: Terry & Patti
lender.loan_because: You give a man a fish, and you feed him for a day. But if you teach a man to fish, you've helped feed him for a lifetime! I feel this is a great way to help people get a start at a better life, and provide for their families while keeping their pride, dignity and self Respect!
lender.occupational_info: As a retired worker, I have a few hobbies. I am building a working miniature scale model (1"equals 10") lumber mill that actually cuts real scale sized lumber! My wife, Patti is a homemaker, and loves to do Quilting. We have 6 Grandchildren!

lender.name: Nicholas
lender.loan_because: I am a believer that people strive to make their lives better. This will make our world better.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve problems, its that simple.

lender.name: John & Eva
lender.loan_because: Someone once took a chance on my dream and this is one of my ways of honoring that first opportunity.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I first saw Kiva on a CNBC report and had to check it. I love this philosophy. I would rather give a hand than a hand-out.
lender.occupational_info: I am a National Guardsman, Senior Technical Support Specialist and independent web and multimedia designer.

lender.name: Fiocco Family
lender.loan_because: Everyone desires a better life, and through hard work and responsibility it can happen. Giving on Kiva is not a charity, its teaching trustworthiness and hard work pays off over time. We ALL can make a difference in other people’s lives and this is my chance to pay back (in a very small way) all those that were supportive of me over the years.
lender.occupational_info: I import construction products used in Luxury Residential and Commercial Development.

lender.name: sergio
lender.loan_because: i loan because i have been helped in times of need and now its my turn to give
lender.occupational_info: i am a profesional firefighter and a heavy equipment mechanic ,i work a total of 70hrs a week and love both my jobs

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Because GOD has given to me, so I share what He has given. Sometimes it only take a helping hand to change a person's life for the better.

lender.name: Aileen
lender.loan_because: I hope it will make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Retired High School Biology Teacher.

lender.name: Barb
lender.loan_because: It is my belief that one person can and does make a difference. What better way to show you care than to invest in the lives of others.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to get to know people around the world and help in some small way to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an insurance broker doing basically clerical work.

lender.name: Eldon
lender.loan_because: Initiative should be rewarded
lender.occupational_info: Principal

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: its the "right" thing to do.

lender.name: mike
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I believe we should all do what we can for those less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I raise rice and soybeans

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I want to help people that want to help themselves any may be less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I use to operate trains for 35 years in the US and Canada. I retired at 53 years of age.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: Individual initiative and work ethic deserve support.
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from public education administration. I had a wonderful career with an opportunity to support instructional inititatives in rural Maryland.

lender.name: Jackie O.
lender.loan_because: I understand and know what is like to start a new business. The struggles and feeling good to achieve your goals. Would like to help others, the power of giving!
lender.occupational_info: I am the Owner/Founder of Prince vendor,llc . Established in 2006, we provide vending machines and products to companies.

lender.name: Jeff & Marla
lender.loan_because: I simply want to help.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: This is the best way we can help others. Hand outs only go so far by being able to reloan money paid back we can use it to help others.

lender.name: richard
lender.loan_because: i don't have alot of money but how can i justify not lending at all.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: I fully believe in helping folks whom want to help themselves. We've all been in need at one time or another. Why not give a helping hand to those whom in turn can help others? I've learned this from my father. So, now, my son is involved! See how great this works?
lender.occupational_info: I work with medical imaging equipment such as Computerized Tomography and other Medical Xray Imaging equipment for a large corporation.

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference even if it is a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to do their jobs better.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: Want to share my blessings with others that have the spirit & potential to do something for themselves, and for others as well, thus setting a wheel in motion that brings well being to all. Together with other kiva members, many grains of sand, can make up a beach.
lender.occupational_info: Business and technical software

lender.name: Emily Testrake
lender.loan_because: I love to help other businesses and this is a very affordable to do that.
lender.occupational_info: I help make weddings and parties beautiful with flowers

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed in life: beautiful home, loving partner, happy family, great comforts that many in the world will never experience. This seemed like a good way to give back.
lender.occupational_info: Intake coordinator for an eating disorders clinic. My job is to be the first contact for young people experiencing the pain and confusion of an illness that takes time and patience to cure.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I am the founder and president of Zane's Cycles. Zane's is the largest supplier of premium bicycles in the world. We have 50 employees and have been in business for 26 years.

lender.name: Steve and Mara
lender.loan_because: We want to help people become self sufficient

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to assist others who are willing to work hard for success.

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I live to give.
lender.occupational_info: Computer, Network, and Website Support Specialist.

lender.name: Robert & Michael
lender.loan_because:
We discovered Kiva at a time when we felt that our financial resources were low, even insufficient--it seems like someone wanted us to have a sharp lesson in perspective.
As we are, ourselves, entrepreneurs, we understand what a small investment in a business can do to help achieve goals.
We believe that Kiva is an incredible way to invest not only in our own future, but that of other entrepreneurs around the world.
lender.occupational_info:
Robert helps families and seniors by educating folks about choices in senior care and retirement living. With more than 30 years in housing and human services, he has made habitation a lifelong career. Bob spends his freetime designing and crafting silver and gemstone jewelry.
Michael makes a living working with folks who are Developmentally Disabled. In the past he has conducted recreational activities for senior citizens, worked as a telephone psychic and in a health food store. He really enjoys getting paid to spend quality time with folks that enrich his life. Michael's freetime is spent creating original works of graphic art. He has recently started working with watercolors.
Our home is in Columbus, Ohio.
